name: Weekly Toolbox Safety Meeting Checklist
Task Analysis Updated & signed
Daily Hazards, Slips & Trips, Manual Handling, Tools & Equipment, Housekeeping, Weather conditions
Please add any remarks
Any new hazards to discuss?
PPE Reminder on Hard hats, Hi-Vis, boots, glasses, gloves, Ear Muffs, Face Visor if using petrol cutter
Site instructions, has everyone heard one?
Notifiable Events
Any accidents minor or others?
Any near misses to discuss about?
Attach photo of attendance sheet
Attach photo of Accident/Incident report if applicable
ST - S - Concrete Reinforcing
Size and type correct to specification
Reinforcing spacing and location correct
Specified covers checked/correct
Splice laps checked/correct
All couplers installed correctly (if reid bar couplers have been used, has epconC8 epoxy been used as specified)
Appointment with the engineers confirmed (Enter date & time of the appointment)
Reidbar – coupler and flange nut installations are inspected by the MV Engineer
IMBMS couplers testing carried out for Village Podiums in the form of tensile testing in accordance with NZS3101.1.2006 and results acceptable
All starter bars are installed correctly (location, size and spacing )
Any additional items installed/ completed (trimmer bars etc) and excess reinforcing removed
Welding certificates sited and attached
Mill certificate reviewed, attached and approved
Reinforcing installed correctly to specification and ready for concrete to be placed
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
